name: Isle of Pan
description: Isle of Pan is a photography adventure in which you explore a mysterious island in the North Sea.  Guided by a magical book, take photographs of the strange inhabitants of the island.  Befriend them and they’ll open up pocket portals, small surreal dimensions that you can return to using the portal door in your homestead.  Customize the book with your favorite photo of each creature, or share your photos with the real world by emailing them to yourself seamlessly in-game.  Works for both VR and regular flatscreen. Online co-op with voice chat. Supports Vive, Rift, and knuckles.
